author: sdeboy
msg: Removing id hashset from cyclic tablemodel
The set was being used to prevent duplicate rows from being added to the table (duplicate rows defined as two events which have the same ID property value).

However, it is possible to define a 'custom expression logpanel' (a dynamic logpanel which combines events from multiple tabs into a new tab) which would need to include events from separate tabs which have the same ID
